name: Flags Around the World
description:
Flags Around the World is an interesting, educational, and challenging game where the player must fill in the country's geography with the correct flag!

The game features six continents with four different difficulties, each progressively harder!  

Be sure to watch the trailer to get a better idea of what the game is like!

I've always had an interest in the flags of the world, and I had this idea to make a game where you had to guess the correct flag of the geography. Here we are now!

All art made in Photoshop, game made in Unity3D, all by me (Justin DiLeonardo)!
